body.description: The Helium Titanium Collection from Delsey Paris is designed for the modern traveller. This lightweight and durable collection is made of 100% polycarbonate with a matte metallic finish to prevent against scratches. This international carry on is made to fit in the overhead bins of most international and domestic airlines, and features a unique front laptop compartment to fit up to a 15.6 inch laptop. This carry on bag expands up to 2 inches, is fully lined and offers two packing compartments with tie-down straps on one side and a zippered divider on the other to minimize shifting of contents. A zippered pcoket holds delicate items and accessories. The four double spinner wheels on this bag are ergonomically designed for a perfect roll with off center wheel axels to provide a wider and more stable base. The bag is easily carried with a dual locking trolley handle or by top and side carry handles for easy lifting. A TSA accepted lock is recessed into the side of the case to allow TSA agents to inspect the bag without damaging the lock. Worldwide Limited 10 Year Warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with the quality and performance of this Delsey luggage
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the quality and performance of this product.I had previously bought another suitcase made by Delsey for a 3 week European vacation during which it performed admirably, and so when I was looking to buy another piece of luggage, I gave preference to the Delsey brand.Having traveled for many years, I had always used traditional soft-sided ballistic nylon pieces, but, after seeing a lot of people in airports using the hard-sided cases, I was open to trying that type of suitcase.When it arrived, I was happy to note how light it was, despite appearing to be very well made. The nylon and zippers all seemed like they were good quality, and I found the lock mechanism interesting (if a little intimidating at first because I had never seen that type before). The lock was very easy to work once I read the directions.On to the actual use... I like the way the two compartments are laid out - one has a nylon zip covering to contain contents, with an integrated zip pocket, the other has an adjustable strap that spans the entire space, plus a small zip pouch. On the way to our destination in the Caribbean, I had the suitcase packed completely full, and it weighed just under 40 lbs. On the way back, it was over-packed with the expandable zipper let out and stuffed to capacity, and still was only 46 lbs.We traveled to 2 small Caribbean islands on regional carriers, and the bag was handled many times at the airport and in transit numerous times. I noticed a few surface scratches, but nothing out of the ordinary. The handles are very comfortable, and the wheels are smooth and the bag is very easy to maneuver.On the way back, an entire 5th of rum exploded in the suitcase, and because it was hard-sided, the majority of it dribbled out the bottom. The contents were hardly affected because they were encased in plastic compression bags, and only part of the nylon lining got rum on it. A big benefit of the bag being hard sided plastic, most of the rum ran out and was not soaked up as it would have been with a fabric bag.On the whole, I could not be happier with this luggage and wholeheartedly can recommend it, as well as being most impressed with both Delsey products we have purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding travelers bag
reviews.reviewText: I've traveled the world hundreds of times using a Delsey bag purchased in 2006, it's an unbelievable tank. Also was more than 2x the price of this bag. The bag, wheels, handles, zippers all still fully functional. Nothing ever broke on that bag. But....it weighs a ton! I bought this new bag knowing it probably will not be as robust or durable but needed something smaller and lighter. For sure the new bag is very light, rolls and manuvers as advertised. Lots of storage space, and the front compartment has me thinking I could even ditch my backpack too for shorter trips! However I can't imagine that it will last for decades like the Delsey tank from 2006. Still, this bag is a winner in my book. Perfect fit for fast and easy travel. Really impressed. Hope it lasts!

reviews.reviewText: Really like the light weight and maneuverability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as their Helium line of luggage
reviews.reviewText: I have had my Delsey cobalt blue helium 19" carry on as my main luggage for when I travel for work. It's perfect for the smaller overhead bins in Southwest and it's sturdy enough to be checked in. After 6 years of hard use, I decided I would treat myself to a new, more updated case. I bought this titanium case in silver and it looks lovely and the wheels are solid. I also like the interior packing compartments better than the helium. However, for me when I travel, I always have a laptop backpack that subs as a purse. I noticed that the extended handle on this bad was thinner and looser, and basically flimsier, than my old helium bag. Not only does it feel like it will snap of you go down a few stairs, the handle part of the extender juts out so if you try and lift your backpack off the handle, the parts of the handle jutting out catch the backpack strap and you have to really work it to get it off. I don't have time for that when I have people breathing down my neck whilst boarding the plane. So, I do love the Delsey brand, just not this line. This is great for road trips and the off vacation, but if you use it all the time for work, go for the helium line. It's a solid workhorse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable titanium suitcase
reviews.reviewText: I cannot comment on the performance of this suitcase since I just received it. It is very attractive and seems like it would be durable - it was rated highly for durability. It moves beautifully along the floor. The silver color is beautiful. I love the separate compartment for my laptop. I would warn you to check the actual dimensions vs what is advertised. It is the 19” but is actually 21.5 inches tall. The other 21” suitcase (large carry on) is more like 23” and will be needed to be checked. I read that from owner reviews so bought the smaller carry on which is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED REVIEW after 18 months & tons of travel: it’s a great suitcase
reviews.reviewText: Updated review after 1 year:So, since leaving my original review I took a job that has me traveling about every other week, on average. This suitcase is great. It’s held up & even though I repeatedly expect the handles to bend due to putting a heavy bag on top, it hasn’t yet. Best feature is that if running through airports to catch a connection is your idea of cardio- and this seems to be my m.o.- then these wheels are a dream. I’m 100% sure I wouldn’t have caught several close connections had I been traveling with a different brand that wouldn’t have been able to handle all the crooks and crannies of terminal floors at high speeds. Added bonus, on the occasion that the flight is overbooked & I have to check my carryon, this suitcase is easy to spot.My previous review mentioned the lock. I’ve had no issues since that first use, so perhaps that’s a learning curve but still one worth getting past.Thought it was flimsy when it arrived but holds up great & moves so easily. 4 stars because it is too easy to accidentally reset the lock meaning you'll have to spend an hour or so going through all the possible combinations to unlock. If you buy, be sure to be mindful not to accidently reset the lock.

reviews.reviewTitle: Maleta pesada que se quiebra con facilidad
reviews.reviewText: Tiene una pésima relación calida - precio, en un sólo viaje la maleta se rompió, daño en las laterales y en el cierre. Nada recomendable, desgraciadamente ya no puedo regresarla ya que la compre con anticipación a una salida de diciembre.

La maleta es de 19” y cabe en cualquier cabina de avión sin necesidad de documentar (Ryanair, Delta, UNITED, Aeromexico, AirFrance, KLM), es muy resistente a diferentes tipos de suelos, escaleras y es muy ergonomica. La recomiendo muchísimo para las personas que no quieran documentar y viajen mucho.
muy amplia y resistente, buena relacion calidad-precio
Justo lo que quería excelente calidad

This is an exact replacement of the spinner that lasted for many years of travel. The case is durable and the matte finish stands up well and it is a dream to manoeuvre through airport and streets. The inside holds a lot of items and the 25” size I never worry about over weight. The zipper section inside means clothes don’t scatter when opened. Highly recommend!!
